content.raw: I wasn’t sure what to do about that. The SDF can take in a set of 3D parameters for linear and angular scaling. The joystick example uses all 3 parameters. The keyboard example I adapted from only uses the linear scale on x, and angular scale on z. I haven’t tried to see what happens if they’re on other axes. Do we want to just remove the 3D parameters, or maybe implement them in another PR?
content.html: I wasn’t sure what to do about that. The SDF can take in a set of 3D parameters for linear and angular scaling. The joystick example uses all 3 parameters. The keyboard example I adapted from only uses the linear scale on x, and angular scale on z. I haven’t tried to see what happens if they’re on other axes. Do we want to just remove the 3D parameters, or maybe implement them in another PR?
